name: Schofferhofer (Hefeweizen Grapefruit Bier)
description:
German engineering at its best brings us this efficient and delicious mix of grapefruit and hefeweizen
ABV 2.5%

name: Paulaner Hefeweizen
description:
Taste the best-selling Weissbier in Germany
ABV 5.5%

name: Paulaner Oktoberfest
description:
This amber style Marzen lager was developed 200 years ago and tastes just as good today
ABV 5.8%

name: Warsteiner Dunkel Lager
description:
Enjoy this smooth & dark lager with all of the roasty-toasty notes you know you love
ABV 4.8%

name: Paulaner Muenchner Lager
description:
Helles, the original Munich lager and best-selling beer at Oktoberfest!
ABV 4.9%

name: Guinness Stout
description:
Looks dark and tough, but drinks smooth and light. The original nitro stout served in its iconic pint glass
ABV 4.2%

name: Other Half DDH Green City
description: Green City has juicy notes of peach rings, grapefruit, mango, and tropical candies. Loaded with oats for a creamy body that’s not too sweet. It is a 6.8% IPA served in a snifter.

name: Shiner Cheer
description:
Peach & Pecan Holiday Ale. It’s like Christmas in a pint!
ABV: 5.4%

name: Dewey Beer Strawberry Pretzel Salad Sour
description: 4% Fruited Gose sour brewed with strawberries, pretzels, and cream. Inspired by one of Delawares favorite desserts. Smooth, and tart, with sweet notes.

name: First State Double Cryptic Cypher
description: 8% West Coast IPA tried-and-true Cascade, Centennial, Citra, & Chinook hops. Assertive, yet balanced, bitterness meets floral notes of grapefruit, pine, citrus, & resin.
